27040.title: Oct 9 - Lloydminster (Southwest) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
27040.summary:
Affected Area: Lloydminster (Southwest)

Affected Services: Internet, Business Internet, Phone, Business Phone, Digital TV, VOD, Gateway, BlueCurve TV, WiFi Access Points

Reference Number: INC0850967

Summary: Some customers in the Southwest area of Lloydminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Live Updates:

10/09/2020 16:56 MT We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
